General Repair

Chevy LS Engine Swap

Supercharge Your Vehicle with a Chevy LS Crate Engine Swap. This beast is no joke when it comes to power. We're talking up to a mind-blowing 525 horsepower and 485 ft-lbs of torque. Say goodbye to sluggish starts and hello to lightning-fast acceleration!

Transplant your Powerplant

If your original engine is shot or you’d like to get more power and performance. we’ll work with you revitalize your classic ride.

Need some work done on your ride?

Give us a bit to respond with a detailed estimate. We need time to do a through review to research and write your estimate.

1 Give us your info

Describe what work you'd like done. You'll receive a text and email once we've reviewed your request.

2 Get an Estimate

We'll review the work needed, source parts, and write-up a detailed estimate just for you.

3 Approve and Schedule Drop-Off

You'll receive your individualized estimate via text or email. Once you approve the estimate, we'll book your car in the shop and our team will get to work.

4 Time is Money

Only pay for the time our team is working on your car. We use advanced methods for accurate time tracking to ensure you won't pay extra.

5 Hit the Road

Our certified team will repair your car and get you back on the road. We'll do the work and make sure it's done right.

To ensure a prompt response, please enter your valid phone number and email

Please be patient: It can take a day or 2 for smaller jobs and a few days for more complex requests.
